page.title: 14EVERYDAY CLOTHES.
page.content: NEARLY ALL THE CLOTHES WE WEAR ARE MACHINE MADE.ONLY ABOUT 5-10% ARE HANDMADE.MOST OF THE MATERIAL WE USE IS COTTON(THAT'S A PLANT)AND WOOL(THAT COMES FROM A SHEEP).WE ALSO USE NYLON AND POLYESTER WHICH ARE MAN_MADE MATERIALS.RICH PEOPLE SOMETIMES HAVE CLOTHES MADE OUT OF SATINS AND OTHER EXPENSIVE MATERALS. ON WEEKDAYS AT OUR JOBS OR SCHOOL WE WEAR NEAT AND TIDY CLOTHES. ON SUNDAYS WHEN WE GO TO CHURCH WE WEAR SMART CLOTHES.MEN WEAR SUITS OR A JACKET AND TROUSERS.GIRLS AND LADIES WEAR NICE DRESSES AND SKIRTS,BOYS JUST WEAR TROUSERS AND A SHIRT. AT OTHER TIMES WE WEAR MORE CASUAL CLOTHES LIKE LADIES WEARING TROUSERS, SHORTS OR A SKIRT AND OFTEN A T.SHIRT OR BLOUSE.MEN AND BOYS WILL OFTEN WEAR JEANS OR SHORTS AND A T.SHIRT. GIRLS CAN WEAR THE SAME AS LADIES.
